name: Space Invaders - Learning Project
description:
Space Invaders - A Learning Project N°2

This a learning project clone of the popular game Space Invaders from 1978.

This project was created with a time frame of 5 days (20 hs) to improve my begining game dev skills.

I try to replicate most of the basic mechanincs of the game as a first level / demo thing.

All assets are created by me, except the SFX as the explosion, these last were download from FreeSound.org

Dev tools:

- Unity (Editor)

- Gimp (2D Assets)

- Bosca Ceoil (Music)

Hope you enjoy this mini game project and if you like leave me feedback of your experience with it.

;)
